{"id":768972547,"question_id":3,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1660017334,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"10 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/768972547/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Substring Without Repeating Characters","memory":"44.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int lengthOfLongestSubstring(String s) {\n\n        int max = 0;\n        \n        if(s.length()<=1)\n            return s.length();\n        \n       HashMap<Character, Integer> map = new HashMap<>();\n        \n        for(int i=0, j=0; i<s.length();i++){\n            char c = s.charAt(i);\n            \n            if(map.containsKey(c)){\n                 j = Math.max(j, map.get(s.charAt(i))+1);  // j=2,  j=1\n            }\n            \n            map.put(c, i);\n            \n            max = Math.max(max, i-j+1);\n        }\n        \n        return max;\n        \n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-substring-without-repeating-characters","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
